attributes.action: pursue the idea of a global government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To help tackle climate change major change is needed. This cannot be succeeded through one government alone nor even several. We need a large committee of countries to come together to form a global government. We would also like the Prime Minister to put this idea forward to COP15 Copenhagen in December. Many will argue that climate change is one of the biggest threats to our species lets do something about it.
